name: Paoay Church
description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site, famous for its earthquake baroque architecture and historical significance.

name: Bangui Windmills
description: The first wind farm in Southeast Asia, offering stunning coastal views and renewable energy.

name: Kapurpurawan Rock Formation
description: A natural rock formation sculpted by ocean and wind forces, perfect for nature lovers.

name: Patapat Viaduct
description: A scenic coastal bridge offering breathtaking views of the West Philippine Sea.

name: La Paz Sand Dunes
description: A unique desert-like landscape where visitors can experience 4x4 rides and sandboarding.

description: A grand presidential residence-turned-museum showcasing the Marcos family's history.

name: Pagudpud Beaches
description: Pristine white sand beaches with crystal-clear waters, perfect for relaxation and water activities.

name: Sinking Bell Tower
description: A historic bell tower that gradually sinks into the ground due to its heavy structure.
